name: International Conference on Art Studies
content: Calling all academics, scientists, scholars, and researchers passionate about art! Join a vibrant community at the International Conference on Art Studies (ARTSTUDIESCONF) - a three-day knowledge festival in the heart of Milan, Italy (October 10th-12th, 2024). Immerse yourself in a stimulating exchange of ideas: At ARTSTUDIESCONF, expect to be captivated by insightful presentations, engaging discussions, and career-shaping networking opportunities. This conference brings together a diverse audience, including artists, art scholars, and enthusiasts, to share their unique blends of expertise, research fields, and experiences. With a variety of formats, such as oral presentations, workshops, poster presentations, and networking sessions, we ensure a truly immersive learning environment that fosters knowledge exchange and collaboration. Beyond presentations, ARTSTUDIESCONF offers: • Publication opportunities: Get your research published in prestigious Scopus-indexed journals or the Conference Proceedings. • Invitation letter: Secure funding or travel permissions with a personalized invitation letter. In addition to the enriching conference program, we invite you to explore the beauty of Milan with a free guided tour of the city. Immerse yourself in its rich history, awe-inspiring architecture, and vibrant art scene, leaving with not only new knowledge but also lifelong memories. Don't miss this chance to elevate your art knowledge, network with like-minded individuals, and explore the breathtaking city of Milan! Register now and be part of the ARTSTUDIESCONF experience!
